title: Game On
description: The days of stinking like a chip shop are almost over for Baljit, because Liverpool FC want him for their youth squad. It's everything he's ever wanted. With his family and girlfriend behind him, life should be coming up roses - only local thugs and match-day disasters intervene, putting all his dreams in jeopardy. A sporty and uplifting teen drama, sequel to bestselling Dream On, particularly suitable for struggling, reluctant and dyslexic readers aged 12+
author: Bali Rai
